basic.name: Blade Dash (Q)
basic.description: Dash forward and deal 63 damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

basic.name: Twin Blades (W)
basic.description: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times. {highlight}Reactivate during Blade Dash to charge a short distance on the target direction, if it collides with an enemy perform the hit sequence{/highlight}

basic.name: Phase Prism (E)
basic.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Hitting a Hero also grants Artanis unstopabble {highlight} during the swap and 0.25 seconds after{/highlight}. Can be used during Blade Dash.

basic.name: Charge blades (?)
basic.description: Artanis dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy. Upon impact will strike the enemy with two basic attacks(Shares cooldown and talent effects with Twin Blades).

heroic.name: Suppression Pulse (R)
heroic.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

heroic.name: Purifier Beam (R)
heroic.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

trait.name: Shield Overload (T)
trait.description: After taking damage while below 75% Health, Artanis gains a 365 Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

1.name: Zealot Parry
1.description: {highlight}When Artanis activates Twin Blades he negates basic attacks damage for 1.25 seconds. 20% of the damage negated will be added to you next Blade Dash first dash{/highlight}

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes. {highlight}Resets cooldown and refunds mana if the target was killed by Twin Blades{/highlight}

1.name: Protector Of Aiur
1.description: {highlight}Hitting an enemy Hero with Twin Blades reduces it's cooldown by 4 and grant a stacking 8% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds. Can only occur once every 7 seconds per Hero.{/highlight}

4.name: Phase Bulwark
4.description: Shield Overload grants {highlight}35{/highlight} Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 125% faster while its Shield is active. Passive: Reduce Shield Overload's cooldown by 4 seconds.

4.name: Shield Surge
4.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 80% while below 25% Health.{highlight} Grant 20% of the Shield Overload's Shields to nearby allied heros{/highlight}

7.name: Triple Strike
7.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

7.name: Chrono Surge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 40% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds and slow the target for 30% for 4 seconds.{highlight} Refreshs cooldown if you hit the target with Twin Blades within 2 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Shield Force
7.description: {highlight}Activate to destroy your current Shield and deal damage 50% of the value as damage to enemies nearby and knock back them{/highlight}

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.name: Templar's  Zeal
13.description: Reduces Blade Dash mana cost to 25. {highlight}Hitting enemy heroes with Blade Dash reduces its cooldown by 3.5 seconds . Blade Dash can be cast while on Blade Dash{/highlight}

13.name: Solarite Reaper
13.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 175%.

13.name: Aiur reinforcements
13.description: {highlight}For each enemy hero hit by Blade Dash reduces Artanis Heroic cooldown by 5%{/highlight}

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

16.name: Force of Will
16.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

16.name: Force of the Prism
16.description: {highlight}When Phase Prism Reaches maximum range it splits into three Phase Prisms and travels extra 25% range. Artanis Won't swap with targets pulled that way{/highlight}

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Zealot Charge
20.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 75%.

20.name: Plasma Burn
20.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 damage per second to nearby enemies.
